KPK Beberkan Sumber Duit Rp 26,5 Miliar Imam Nahrawi
05 Nov 2019, 23:02 by M Rosseno Aji, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) membeberkan duit Rp 26,5 miliar yang diduga diterima mantan Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga Imam Nahrawi. Hal ini termuat dalam berkas jawaban KPK atas praperadilan yang dilakukan Imam ke Pengadilan Negeri Jakarta Selatan.
"Bahwa Termohon (KPK) memperoleh sejumlah data dan informasi yang dapat menerangkan adanya serangkaian peristiwa penerimaan sejumlah uang kepada Saudara Imam Nahrawi (pemohon) selaku Menpora," kata tim Biro Hukum KPK dalam persidangan di Pengadilan Jaksel, Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Tim Biro Hukum menyebutkan Imam diduga menerima uang itu melalui perantara asisten pribadinya, Miftahul Ulum maupun lewat orang lain. Berikut ini adalah daftarnya:
Melalui Ulum:
1. Rp 11,5 miliar pada 2018. Uang itu berasal dari Sekretaris Jenderal Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia Ending Fuad Hamidy untuk pengurusan tiga proposal dana hibah selama 2018.
2. Rp 400 juta pada akhir 2017 dari Mulyana, Chandra Bhakti dan Supriyono sebagai 'honor' selaku Ketua Dewan Pengarah Satlak Prima. KPK menilai jumlah honor melebihi nilai kewajaran.
3. Rp 1,5 miliar dari Ending Fuad Hamidy pada akhir 2017.
4. Rp 1 miliar terkait Satlak Prima pada akhir 2017. Uang diambil oleh Ulum di rumah Taufik Hidayat, mantan atlet bulu tangkis yang saat itu menjabat Wakil Ketua Satlak Prima.
5. Rp 300 juta dari Sekretaris Kemenpora, Alfitra Salam pada 6 Agustus 2015. Uang itu dipakai Imam untuk acara muktamar organisasi keagamaan.
Melalui orang lainnya:
1. Rp 7 miliar dari Ending pada November 2018. Uang diberikan lewat Lina Nurhasanah. KPK menduga uang ini dipakai untuk penanganan perkara adik Imam, Syamsul Arifin di salah satu aparat hukum.
2. Rp 800 juta pada 12 Januari 2017. Imam diduga menerima uang ini melalui Taufik Hidayat untuk pengurusan perkara adiknya, Syamsul Arifin.
3. Rp 2 miliar pada 2016 dutengarai diterima melalui PNS Kemenpora. Uang kemudian disetorkan ke kas negara lewat Badan Pemeriksa Keuangan sebagai pengganti kerugian negara.
4. Rp 2 miliar pada November 2016 diduga melalui Reiki Mamesah untuk memuluskan pengajuan anggaran Olympic Center di APBN-P 2016.
Imam dalam beberapa kesempatan membantah terlibat kasus korupsi di Kemenpora. Setelah ditetapkan menjadi tersangka, ia menyangkal menerima duit itu. "Tentu pada saatnya tentu harus kita buktikan bersama sama karena saya tidak seperti yang dituduhkan kita akan mengikuti seperti apa di pengadilan," kata Imam di kediamannya di Kompleks Menteri Widya Chandra, Jakarta, Rabu, 18 September 2019.

KPK Reveals Rp26.5 Billion in Financial Resources Imam Nahrawi
05 Nov 2019, 23:02 by M Rosseno Aji, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) disclosed IDR 26.5 billion in funds allegedly received by former Minister of Youth and Sports Imam Nahrawi. This is contained in the KPK's answer file on the pretrial conducted by Imam to the South Jakarta District Court.
"That the Respondent (KPK) obtained a number of data and information that could explain the occurrence of a series of incidents of receiving a sum of money to Brother Imam Nahrawi (applicant) as Menpora," the KPK Legal Bureau team said during a hearing at the South Jakarta District Court, Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
The Legal Bureau team said the priest allegedly received the money through the intermediary of his personal assistant, Miftahul Ulum or through other people. The following is a list:
Via Ulum:
1. Rp. 11.5 billion in 2018. The money came from the Secretary General of the Indonesian National Sports Committee, Ending Fuad Hamidy, for handling three grant funding proposals during 2018.
2. Rp. 400 million at the end of 2017 from Mulyana, Chandra Bhakti and Supriyono as 'honor' as Chairman of the Satlak Prima Steering Board. KPK assesses the amount of honorariums exceeding the fairness value.
3. Rp 1.5 billion from Ending Fuad Hamidy at the end of 2017.
4. Rp 1 billion related to Satlak Prima at the end of 2017. Money was taken by Ulum at the home of Taufik Hidayat, a former badminton athlete who was then serving as Deputy Chairperson of Satlak Prima.
5. Rp. 300 million from the Secretary of the Ministry of Youth and Sports, Alfitra Salam on August 6, 2015. The money was used by the Imam for a conference of religious organizations.
Through others:
1. Rp. 7 billion from Ending in November 2018. Money was given through Lina Nurhasanah. The KPK suspects that this money was used for handling the case of Imam's brother, Syamsul Arifin, in one of the legal apparatus.
2. Rp. 800 million on January 12, 2017. Imam is suspected of receiving this money through Taufik Hidayat for handling the case of his younger brother, Syamsul Arifin.
3. Rp. 2 billion in 2016 was received through PNS Kemenpora. The money is then deposited in the state treasury through the Supreme Audit Board as a substitute for state losses.
4. Rp. 2 billion in November 2016 was allegedly through Reiki Mamesah to smooth the submission of the Olympic Center's budget in the 2016 APBN-P.
The priest on several occasions denied involvement in corruption cases in the Ministry of Youth and Sports. After being named a suspect, he denied receiving the money. "Of course, in due course we must prove it together because I am not as charged as what we are going to follow in court," Imam said at his residence in the Widya Chandra Ministerial Complex, Jakarta, Wednesday, September 18, 2019.
